nodes.title: AGI Runtime Tree
nodes.excerpt: Planning, execution, refinement, and trace capture for AGI runs.
nodes.bodyMD:
This tree maps the plan/execute runtime and its supporting services, including planner logic, refinery gates, and trace capture.

Minimal artifact: AGI runtime flow map.

nodes.title: Plan + Execute Router
nodes.excerpt: Plan/execute entrypoints and Helix Ask runtime.
nodes.bodyMD:
Plan/execute endpoints, Helix Ask orchestration, and evidence handling (server/routes/agi.plan.ts).

Minimal artifact: plan/execute routing map.

nodes.title: Planner Core
nodes.excerpt: Plan synthesis, grounding, and agent routing.
nodes.bodyMD:
Planner core logic (server/services/planner/chat-b.ts, server/services/planner/grounding.ts, server/services/planner/agent-map.ts, server/services/planner/why-belongs.ts, server/services/planner/supplements.ts).

Minimal artifact: planner decision flow.

nodes.title: Refinery Gates
nodes.excerpt: Refinery gates, variants, and trajectory capture.
nodes.bodyMD:
Refinery gates and trajectory capture (server/services/agi/refinery-gates.ts, server/services/agi/refinery-trajectory.ts, server/services/agi/refinery-variants.ts, server/services/agi/refinery-policy.ts, server/routes/agi.refinery.ts).

Minimal artifact: refinery gate map.

nodes.title: Trace + Memory
nodes.excerpt: Trace capture, memory, and audit trails.
nodes.bodyMD:
Trace and memory APIs (server/routes/agi.trace.ts, server/routes/agi.memory.ts, server/routes/agi.memory.trace.ts) and training trace storage (server/services/observability/training-trace-store.ts).

Minimal artifact: trace and memory flow.

nodes.title: Evaluation
nodes.excerpt: Eval smoke runs and regression harnesses.
nodes.bodyMD:
Evaluation workflow (server/services/agi/eval-smoke.ts, server/routes/agi.eval.ts).

Minimal artifact: eval smoke checklist.

nodes.title: Adapter Bridge
nodes.bodyMD:
Adapter endpoint and contract docs (server/routes/agi.adapter.ts, docs/ADAPTER-CONTRACT.md, cli/casimir-verify.ts).

Minimal artifact: adapter contract map.

nodes.title: Chat Sessions
nodes.bodyMD:
Chat session routes and renderer (server/routes/agi.chat.ts, server/services/agi/chat-render.ts, server/db/chatSessions).

Minimal artifact: chat session lifecycle.

nodes.title: Contributions
nodes.bodyMD:
Contribution routes and service layer (server/routes/agi.contributions.ts, server/services/contributions).

Minimal artifact: contribution intake map.

nodes.title: Constraint Packs
nodes.bodyMD:
Constraint pack endpoints and services (server/routes/agi.constraint-packs.ts, server/services/constraint-packs).

Minimal artifact: constraint pack registry.

nodes.title: Resilience
nodes.bodyMD:
Circuit breaker controls (server/services/resilience/circuit-breaker.ts).

Minimal artifact: resilience guard summary.

nodes.title: Learning Loop
nodes.bodyMD:
Learning reflection helpers (server/services/learning/reflect.ts).

Minimal artifact: reflection loop summary.

nodes.title: Knowledge Compositor
nodes.bodyMD:
Knowledge composition (server/services/planner/knowledge-compositor.ts, server/services/knowledge/merge.ts, server/config/knowledge.ts).

Minimal artifact: knowledge compositor flow.
